name: Trapper's Delight
description: In Trapper's Delight players compete to construct deadly labyrinths and then try to escape in one piece. Lure your friends into your deadly trap in local and online multiplayer or test your skills in singleplayer challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support, 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
